rules.description: [Mac] Fn to Escape on single press, Fn on press and hold.
[R2] CapsLock to Escape on single press, Fn on press and hold.
[R2] Ctrl + Arrow Keys to Option + Arrow Keys
[R2] Ctrl + Shift + Arrow Keys to Option + Shift + Arrow Keys
[R2] Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
Fire up (if needed) Things and open Quick Entry
Safari: Quit by pressing command-q twice
iTerm:FZF - Control+SuperX -> Ctrl+R - Search last commands
TrainerRoad: Spacebar -> T (Trainer Mode on Spacebar)
TrainerRoad: Right Cmd -> T (Trainer Mode on Spacebar)
TrainerRoad: Right Opt -> T (Trainer Mode on Spacebar)
TrainerRoad: Right Shift -> T (Trainer Mode on Spacebar)
TrainerRoad: Return -> Spacebar (Workout Pause on Return)
